pddl4j.util

Class BitMeth

  • java.lang.Object
    • pddl4j.util.AbstractCodedOp
      • pddl4j.util.BitMeth
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CodedOp

    public class BitMeth
extends AbstractCodedOp
    This class implements a compact representation for method based on BitSet structure.
    See Also:
